name: Vegetarian Omelet
description:
Blast carrots with mushrooms. Unlock new upgrades by increasing your score. Once 3 mushrooms are purchased, special upgrades become unlocked. You receive more score for kills using mushrooms that launch at high angles!

Each mushroom has randomized attributes. Got a bad starting mushroom that only gives 10 score per kill? Restart and get a better one.

Mushroom upgrades include: Extra Damage, Increased Size, Reduced Cooldown, Pierce Targets, Shoot Additional Mushroom, Poison Effect, Freeze (slowing) Effect

CONTROLS:

WASD to move aimer.

Spacebar to shoot / start game

Q to change weapons.

Assets used:

Carrot: https://defadaj.itch.io/carrot-chgaracter

Music: 

 Fluffing a Duck Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

This game was made in four minutes.

Just kidding
